method.name: SetUserName
method.description: Sets the users username. Note that it is usually not allowed to have multiple users with the same username.

method.name: SetRealName

arg.name: name
arg.description: The new name, typically in the form "Firstname Lastname".

method.description: Sets the users real name.

method.name: SetEmail
method.description: Sets the users email address.

method.name: SetLanguage

arg.name: language
arg.description: The new language, as a locale specification like "de_DE.UTF-8".

method.description: Sets the users language.

method.name: SetXSession

arg.name: x_session
arg.description: The new xsession to start (e.g. "gnome")

method.description: Sets the users x session.

method.name: SetSession

arg.name: session
arg.description: The new session to start (e.g. "gnome-xorg")

method.description: Sets the users wayland or x session.

method.name: SetSessionType

arg.name: session_type
arg.description: The type of the new session to start (e.g. "wayland" or "x11")

method.description: Sets the session type of the users session.

method.name: SetHomeDirectory

arg.name: homedir
arg.description: The new homedir as an absolute path.

method.description: Sets the users home directory.

method.name: SetShell

arg.name: shell
arg.description: The new user shell.

method.description: Sets the users shell.

method.name: SetIconFile

arg.name: filename
arg.description: The absolute filename of a png file to use as the users icon.

method.description: Sets the users icon.

method.name: SetLocked

arg.name: locked
arg.description: Whether to lock or unlock the users account.

method.description: Locks or unlocks a users account.

method.name: SetAccountType

arg.name: account_type
arg.description: The new account type, encoded as an integer. Refer to AccountsAccountType in accounts-i.h

method.description: Changes the users account type.

method.name: SetPasswordMode

arg.name: mode
arg.description: The new password mode, encoded as an integer:

method.description: Changes the users password mode. Note that changing the password mode has the side-effect of unlocking the account.

method.name: SetPassword

arg.name: password
arg.description: The crypted password.

arg.name: hint
arg.description: The password hint.

method.description: Sets a new password for this user. Note that setting a password has the side-effect of unlocking the account.

method.name: SetPasswordByPasswd

arg.name: encrypted_current_password
arg.description: The current password is required when set the user itself. otherwise, the current password can be set to null. The password should be encrypted by rsa algorithm.

arg.name: encrypted_new_password
arg.description: The new password. The password should be encrypted by rsa algorithm.

method.description: Sets a new password by passwd command for this user. Note that setting a password has the side-effect of unlocking the account.

method.name: SetPasswordHint

arg.name: hint
arg.description: The password hint.

method.description: Sets the users password hint.

method.name: SetAutomaticLogin

arg.name: enabled
arg.description: Whether to enable automatic login for this user.

method.description: Enables or disables automatic login for a user. Note that usually only one user can have automatic login enabled, so turning it on for a user will disable it for the previously configured autologin user.

method.name: SetPasswordExpirationPolicy

arg.name: options
arg.description: The password expiration policy options that is a jason string which format refer to property password_expiration_policy.

method.description: Set user password expiry information which contain expiration_time, last_change_time, min_days_between_changes, max_days_between_changes, days_to_warn, inactive_days_after_expiration

method.name: AddAuthItem

arg.name: mode
arg.description: The authentication mode which could be fingerprint, face, etc. Refer to AccountsAuthMode in accounts-i.h

arg.name: name
arg.description: the name of the authentication item. For example fingerprint 1, fingerprint 2, etc.

arg.name: data_id
arg.description: The identity of the collected data for the authentication item.

method.description: Add an auth item for a mode. Return error if the name already exists or the method is unsupported.

method.name: DelAuthItem
method.description: Delete an auth item by name. Return error if the name doesn't exist or the method is unsupported.

arg.name: auth_items_json
arg.description: The json string is an array that every item contains name and the identity of the collected data.

method.name: EnableAuthMode
method.description: Enable or disable the authentication mode.
